document.full_text: ivory coast tipped further toward civil war tuesday as soldiers loyal to alassane ouattara, the former prime minister and banker, continued their fight against the strongman laurent gbagbo.
document.title: opposition forces in ivory coast take towns on 2 fronts
lines_and_colors: ivory coast tipped further toward civil war tuesday as soldiers loyal to alassane ouattara, the former prime minister and banker, continued their fight against the strongman laurent gbagbo.
